summary: December 13 is the 347th day of the year  in the Gregorian calendar.
full_text:
William Victor "Bill" Roth, Jr.  was an American lawyer and politician from Wilmington, Delaware. He was a veteran of World War II and a member of the Republican Party, who served as U.S. Representative and U.S. Senator from Delaware.
Roth was a sponsor of legislation creating the Roth IRA, an individual retirement plan that can be set up with a broker.
title: William V. Roth, Jr.
